api.lib.optimization package

Package contents

Optimization root package.

Contains following modules:

Modules:

  • base: contains base optimization classes and functions

  • gd: contains Gradient Descent optimizers (GD, SGD)

Modules

api.lib.optimization.base module

Contains base optimizer class and Minimize Operation.

class api.lib.optimization.base.Optimizer

Bases: ABC

Base optimizer class.

abstract minimize(*args, **kwargs)

Init and return _MinimizeOp.

api.lib.optimization.gd module

Contains implementation of Gradient Descent optimizers (GD, SGD)

class api.lib.optimization.gd.GradientDescent(learning_rate)

Bases: Optimizer

Gradient Descent optimizer.

The most basic and classic optimization algorithm which is commonly-used in neural networks.

Update rule: \(x_{k+1} = x_k - \alpha \nabla f'\)

Parameters

learning_rate (float) – some small positive value

minimize(floss)

Init and return _MinimizeOp.
